amendment.description: To amend section 1111(d) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 regarding the cross-tabulation of student data.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2120 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 2120 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Warren to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S4906, S4912, S4913; text: CR S4912) To amend section 1111(d) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 regarding the cross-tabulation of student data.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2120 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Warren to Amendment SA 2089.
